hypothesis_content.title: L2 Narrative Convergence Play
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL regimes with elevated altcoin discussion volume, L2 tokens mentioned in 3+ major crypto news outlets within 24 hours will outperform non-mentioned L2s by 5-8% over next 48 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Current news cycle shows STRK/MYX/ARB narrative building. NEUTRAL regimes favor narrative-driven moves over macro-driven ones. News convergence creates FOMO among retail and momentum traders.
entry_conditions: Token appears in ≥3 major crypto news headlines (CoinTelegraph, Decrypt, etc.)
Social volume spike > 200% 24hr average (LunarCrush or similar)
Token not already at 30-day highs (avoid chasing)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 7% gain or social volume returns to baseline
exit_conditions.stop_loss: 4% loss or BTC drops >3% in single day

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: News-driven token fails to outperform broader L2 index (L2BEAT constituents) or shows immediate profit-taking after pump.
